text: The 1983 UCI Track Cycling World Championships were the World Championship for track cycling. They took place in Zurich, Switzerland in 1983.World Championship Track Cycling 2014-1893 Fourteen events were contested, 12 for men (5 for professionals, 7 for amateurs) and 2 for women. ==Medal summary== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Professional Events |- |Men's keirin | Urs Freuler || Danny Clark || Gilbert Hatton |- |Men's sprint | Kōichi Nakano || Yavé Cahard || Ottavio Dazzan |- | |Steele Bishop || Robert Dill-Bundi || Hans-Henrik Ørsted |- |Men's points race |Urs Freuler || Guido Bontempi || Gary Sutton |- |Men's motor-paced | Bruno Vicino || René Koos || Martin Havik |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Amateur Events |- | |Sergei Kopylov || Gerhard Scheller || Lothar Thoms |- |Men's sprint |Lutz Hesslich || Sergei Kopylov || Michael Hübner |- | |Viktor Kupovets || Bernd Dittert || Dainis Leipinch |- |Men's team pursuit | Rolf Gölz Roland Günther Gerhard Strittmatter Michael Marx || Carsten Wolf Mario Hernig Bernd Dittert Hans-Joachim Pohl || Pavel Soukup Ales Trcka František Raboň Robert Sterba |- |Men's points race |Michael Marcussen || Hans-Joachim Pohl || Ivan Romanov |- |Men's motor-paced |Rainer Podlesch || Mattheus Pronk || Walter Baumgartner |- |Men's tandem | Philippe Vernet Franck Depine || Ivan Kucirek Pavel Martinek || Dieter Giebken Fredy SchmidtkeDieter Giebken Fredy Schmidtke were disqualified due to a positif doping test on éphédrine afterwards |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Women's Events |- |Women's sprint |Connie Paraskevin |Claudia Lommatzsch |Isabelle Nicoloso |- |Women's individual pursuit |Connie Carpenter |Cynthia Olavarri |Jeannie Longo |} ==Medal table== ==See also== * 1983 UCI Road World Championships ==References== Track cycling Category:UCI Track Cycling World Championships by year Category:International cycle races hosted by Switzerland Category:1983 in track cycling Category:Sport in Zürich Category:20th century in Zürich
title: 1983 UCI Track Cycling World Championships
